articles.author: David McHugh, AP
articles.title: Report: Global air crash deaths fall more than half in 2019
articles.description: Far fewer people died in major air crashes around the world last year
articles.content:
FRANKFURT, Germany The number of deaths in major air crashes around the globe fell by more than half in 2019, according to a report by an aviation consulting firm.
The To70 consultancy said Wednesday that 257 people died in eight fatal accidents in 2019. Tha… [+1628 chars]

articles.content:

articles.title: Climate change in the 2010s: Decade of fires, floods and scorching heat waves
